summary.Title: Fleet Manager in Malmö/Taastrup/Horsens
summary.Presentation: Do you have a passion for logistics, safety and stakeholder relations? We offer you an opportunity in a company that understands that as you grow, so do we. One of your colleagues

WorkPlace.Name: AIR LIQUIDE DANMARK A/S
WorkPlace.OrganizationDescription:
Air Liquide Danmark A/S er den største leverandør af medicinske og industrielle gasser på det danske marked. I 2003 omsatte virksomheden for 433 millioner DKK. Air Liquide Danmark A/S beskæftiger ca. 275 ansatte.

Air Liquide Danmark A/S´ hovedkontor er beliggende i Ballerup, og virksomheden har derudover afdelinger i Horsens, Hedensted, Odense og Taastrup.

HiringOrg.Name: AIR LIQUIDE DANMARK A/S
HiringOrg.OrganizationDescription:
Air Liquide Danmark A/S er den største leverandør af medicinske og industrielle gasser på det danske marked. I 2003 omsatte virksomheden for 433 millioner DKK. Air Liquide Danmark A/S beskæftiger ca. 275 ansatte.

Air Liquide Danmark A/S´ hovedkontor er beliggende i Ballerup, og virksomheden har derudover afdelinger i Horsens, Hedensted, Odense og Taastrup.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you have a passion for logistics, safety and stakeholder relations? We offer you an opportunity in a company that understands that as you grow, so do we. One of your colleagues is taking the next step in their career in our company, which is why we are now looking for a new Nordic Fleet Manager!

Why work for us?
Air Liquide is one of the world’s leading suppliers of gasses, technologies and services for Industry and Health. Since our creation in 1902, we have grown and remained as a solid organization which is today present in 78 countries with approximately 64,500 employees and serves more than 3.8 million customers and patients. Through our sustainability initiatives, we take action for our continued growth in a low-carbon society with a transition to a clean and sustainable industry.

Diversity among our employees creates creativity and dynamism, which is the source of our success. That is why we work continuously to create a fantastic workplace where we encourage innovation, inclusion and collaboration with great career opportunities both nationally and internationally. 

Your mission and how you’ll make an impact
As Fleet Manager, you are responsible for the Air Liquide trailer fleet which means to have a reliable and optimal fleet at all times to secure our customers' business continuity. This is by ensuring we follow group standards for containers and trailers, monitor asset utilization and fleet sizing and propose version and upgrading programs. 

Main task and responsibilities: 

  • Fleet management
  • Key person between our internal and external workshop with focus on quality and safety
  • Maintenance contacts
  • Cost control and budget
  • Stakeholder management with external carriers, drivers and logistics teams 
  • Ensure safety standards are adhered to Air Liquide group standards and compliance with legislation
  • Execute and participate in audits for ex. workshops, drivers, carriers
  • You will work, in close collaboration, with the local logistic team to ensure safe and reliable transport at all times. 

Safety is Air Liquide highest priority and it is expected that our Fleet manager will be part of Air Liquide Nordic Road safety program that includes a role in training of internal and external stakeholders. 

Sustainability is an important strategic pillar for Air Liquide and we have very ambitious targets to reduce our carbon footprint and this role will have an impact on the daily performance to reach the target.

Who are you?
To be successful in this position, you have more than 5 years of experience working in logistics planning, service management, workshop management or similar and have an educational background within logistics. It’s a plus if you already have knowledge within ADR (Carriage of Dangerous Goods by Road), Safety advisor, Cryo trailers and have worked with data management systems. You are empathetic and aware that good communication and follow-up are essential for a good collaboration. You speak and understand Danish or Swedish and have a good understanding of English.

As a person, we believe that you have developed skills in prioritizing in a fast-paced work environment and have the ability to maintain your efficiency even during more hectic situations. You keep your eyes set on the objectives and keep the customer’s needs as your highest priority. At Air Liquide, we always try to develop ourselves and processes, and therefore we are looking for someone with a continuous improvement mindset willing to share ideas and feedback with the team.

Additional Information
Our team is based both in Denmark and Sweden. Therefore, this position has a flexible location at our offices in Malmö, Taastrup or Horsens. You will report to Allan Witt, Nordic Supply Chain Manager. If you have any questions about the role, please contact Allan Witt, +45 28 43 26 16.

Ready for your next challenge? Apply via the link (we do not accept applications via email) no later than May 12. We will look through applications as they come in, so don’t hesitate to apply already today!

This recruitment is handled by our in-house recruitment team. For that reason, we do not want any contact from recruitment/consultancy agencies. Thank you!
